Package userinterface

Class Browsr

java.lang.Object
canvaswindow.CanvasWindow
userinterface.Browsr
public class Browsr
extends canvaswindow.CanvasWindow
A class to represent the userinterface.Browsr window, with an AddressBar and a DocumentArea.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    protected class  Browsr.BookmarksDialogLayout
    A Browsr.Layout that represents the layout for this Browsr object when a BookmarksDialog is opened, containing a Name and URL UITextInputField and a Save and Cancel UIButton.
    protected static class  Browsr.Layout
    An abstract class which represents the possible layouts of a Browsr object.
    protected class  Browsr.RegularLayout
    A Browsr Layout that represents the regular layout containing a an AddressBar, a BookmarksBar and a DocumentArea.
    protected class  Browsr.SaveDialogLayout
    A Browsr.Layout that represents the layout for this Browsr object when a SaveDialog is opened, containing a Name and URL UITextInputField and a Save and Cancel UIButton.

    Constructors
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected Browsr​(java.lang.String title)
    Initializes this Browsr as CanvasWindow object: the initial layout consists of: an AddressBar, a BookmarksBar and a DocumentArea

    • handleResize

      protected void handleResize()
      Handle the resizing of this userinterface.Browsr window and its sub windows.

      N.B.: without this method, BookmakrBar would be rendered with the given absolute width, and thus one would need to guess the correct initial size of the window. Using this method, widths are automatically adjusted: both at initialization and at runtime.

      Overrides:
      handleResize in class canvaswindow.CanvasWindow

    • handleMouseEvent

      protected void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount, int button, int modifiersEx)
      Handle mouseEvents. Determine which part of this BrowsrDocument was pressed and do the right actions.
      Overrides:
      handleMouseEvent in class canvaswindow.CanvasWindow
      Parameters:
      id - : The type of mouse activity
      x - : The x coordinate of the mouse activity
      y - : The y coordinate of the mouse activity
      clickCount - : The number of clicks
      button - : The mouse button that was clicked
      modifiersEx - : The control keys that were held on the click

    • handleKeyEvent

      protected void handleKeyEvent​(int id, int keyCode, char keyChar, int modifiersEx)
      Handle key presses. This method does the right action when a key is pressed.
      Overrides:
      handleKeyEvent in class canvaswindow.CanvasWindow
      Parameters:
      id - : The KeyEvent (Associated with type of KeyEvent)
      keyCode - : The KeyEvent code (Determines the involved key)
      keyChar - : The character representation of the involved key
      modifiersEx - : Specifies other keys that were involved in the event
